authors.name: Jennifer Stark
authors.affiliation: Computational Journalism Lab, University of Maryland, College Park

title: Six Stories about Algorithms
description: A discussion about the consequences of algorithms on public and personal interests, focusing on six specific stories and their significance, and brainstorming ideas for investigating algorithm-related issues.
